title: ನಾಯಿ ನೆರಳು [Naayi Neralu]
description: Dog and shadow are the symbols of our Karma, which follow us through all our births. A young boy remembers what he was in his previous life, and on exploration a town and a family therein was discovered corresponding to his descriptions. A middle aged widow of that family and her son turn out to be this boy’s wife and son from his previous life. The widow accepts him as her husband but the boy rejects him. It is a para-psychological novel exploring psychological and social depths of the characters and society.
author: S.L. Bhyrappa
